about_the_game:
Mini Racer Car Shop Simulator allow you to manage every aspect of your mini racer car shop! Sell detailed mini cars and a variety of spare parts, offer gacha draws for rare items, and showcase your custom-built mini cars for customers to buy. As you grow your business, you can test drive your creation in race tracks to evaluate your custom build mini cars and turning your shop into the top destination for car enthusiasts!

Sell Mini Cars

You'll have access to a wide variety of miniature racing car models, all crafted with impressive detail to attract car enthusiasts. You'll need to carefully manage your stock to ensure you always have the best selection available, keeping your customers satisfied and your business thriving. As the shop owner, you also can have your own mini cars collection by opening car packs.

Sell Spare Parts

Not only do you sell miniature cars, but you can also offer a variety of spare parts to enhance the performance of the mini cars. From mini engines to wheels and unique spare parts, provide your customers with the best selection to build their dream mini cars. Each part has different quality levels and performance, so you need to be strategic in stocking and providing the best for your loyal customers. You also can grab a pack for modifying your own car.

Custom Car Showcase

Show off your best work in an eye-catching showcase area! Here, you can display your most impressive custom-built mini cars for customers to buy. For each masterpiece you can set your own price based on the cars performance.

Spare Parts Gacha

To give an extra layer of excitement, each car packs feature a gacha system where you can try your luck to get rare spare parts. Each draw offers a random part, which could be the crucial piece needed to complete your ultimate mini car.

Test Drive Your Car

Experience test drive your custom-built mini cars on a race track! This feature allows you to feel the performance of your custom-built cars firsthand. Whether it's testing speed, handling, or unique upgrades, the race track provides an exciting way to showcase the quality and capability of your custom-built mini cars.

Mini Racer Car Shop Simulator offers creativity making it an ideal haven for mini car enthusiasts. Start today and transform your shop into the ultimate destination for customers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Manage your mini racer car shop, sell mini cars and spare parts, and unleash your creativity with custom builds. Test drive your creations on the race track before putting them up for sale. Transform your shop into a haven for mini car enthusiasts and build a thriving business in the process!
